articles.title: Amazon overhauls Fire TV UI and launches Ember Artline displays
articles.description: Amazon rolled out a Fire TV redesign that emphasizes content visibility and simplifies navigation, accompanied by updated Fire TV app and new Ember Artline televisions with customizable frames. The changes address user interface clutter and search time issues, launching first in the U.S. in February on select devices. Fire TV Vice President Aidan Marcuss stated […]

articles.title: AI agent-driven browser automation for enterprise workflow management
articles.description: Enterprise organizations increasingly rely on web-based applications for critical business processes, yet many workflows remain manually intensive, creating operational inefficiencies and compliance risks. Despite significant technology investments, knowledge workers routinely navigate between eight to twelve different web applications during standard workflows, constantly switching contexts and manually transferring information between systems. Data entry and validation tasks […]

articles.title: Imperial College London develops AI to accelerate cardiac drug discovery
articles.description: Scientists at Imperial College London developed CardioKG, an AI tool that identifies genes linked to heart disease and accelerates drug discovery by combining heart imaging data from the UK Biobank with large medical databases. Cardiovascular diseases cause 1.7 million deaths annually in the European Union. Cardiovascular diseases rank as the leading cause of death and […]

articles.title: A new framework for  keeping AI accountable
articles.description: A new accountability framework treats AI responsibility as a continuous control problem, embedding values into systems and monitoring harm over time.
articles.author: Marisa Garanhel
articles.content: A new accountability framework treats AI responsibility as a continuous control problem, embedding values into systems and monitoring harm over time.

articles.title: HHS Doubles AI-Backed Childhood Cancer Research Funding

articles.title: Best Options Trading Platforms
articles.description: The post Best Options Trading Platforms by Ryan Peterson appeared first on Benzinga. Visit Benzinga to get more great content like this. If you’re looking to hedge against risk, generate income, or make directional bets on stocks and indexes, options trading can give you greater strategic flexibility. But options are also complex. Traders need platforms that go beyond simple buy and sell buttons, while offering access to real-time data, the Greeks, volatility metrics, and clear risk/reward...

articles.title: NIH establishes nation's first dedicated organoid development center to reduce reliance on animal modeling
articles.description: The Standardized Organoid Modeling Center aims to produce standardized protocols for organoid research, addressing reproducibility challenges.
articles.content: The Standardized Organoid Modeling Center aims to produce standardized protocols for organoid research, addressing reproducibility challenges.

articles.title: NVIDIA AI Released Nemotron Speech ASR: A New Open Source Transcription Model Designed from the Ground Up for Low-Latency Use Cases like Voice Agents
articles.description: NVIDIA has just released its new streaming English transcription model (Nemotron Speech ASR) built specifically for low latency voice agents and live captioning. The checkpoint nvidia/nemotron-speech-streaming-en-0.6b on Hugging Face combines a cache aware FastConformer encoder with an RNNT decoder, and is tuned for both streaming and batch workloads on modern NVIDIA GPUs. Model design, architecture […] The post NVIDIA AI Released Nemotron Speech ASR: A New Open Source Transcription Model...
articles.author: Asif Razzaq
articles.content: NVIDIA has just released its new streaming English transcription model (Nemotron Speech ASR) built specifically for low latency voice agents and live captioning. The checkpoint nvidia/nemotron-speech-streaming-en-0.6b on Hugging Face combines a cache aware FastConformer encoder with an RNNT decoder, and is tuned for both streaming and batch workloads on modern NVIDIA GPUs. articles.title: NVIDIA DLSS 4.5, Path Tracing and G-SYNC Pulsar Supercharge Gameplay With Enhanced Performance and Visuals
articles.description: At the CES trade show, NVIDIA today announced DLSS 4.5, which introduces Dynamic Multi Frame Generation, a new 6X Multi Frame Generation mode and a second-generation transformer model for DLSS Super Resolution, so gamers can experience the latest and greatest titles with enhanced performance and visuals.
